title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: Ormskirk is a cute, long-headed chap; and, knowing the man well, I wasreally not surprised when, yesterday morning, I received a letter fromhim advising me that, without any difficulty, he had 'struck' the rightLaurieston, and that through our corresponding agent in Falkirk thepicture in question had been secured.

title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: 'Much as I expect of this picture as a big draw at my bazaar,and anxious as I am to take it back with me to-morrow to Laurieston, I'mafraid I must call you to a halt.

title: Romance of War ... New edition
author: Grant, James
snippet: Hetakes his title of Clappourknuis from some little knowes, which standbetween the old castle of Laurieston and the Frith of Forth.
